column5: Still want it? It's a custom 4-piece now...    Over the last 2 years I haven't ran a rod that I was at home behind as this Avid   . Thank god for the Croix warranty!  Here was her last fight...a banged up Gladiator of a buck  , fought like a Walleye on Heroin     and was released to fight another day. My best attempt at the Solopaddler smirk
It snapped in two spots to make it a 4 piece? Yikes if that's the case. Though, that is a beauty catch!
The solopaddler smirk?   Exactly how does a rod break into that many pieces? LOL!
Hmmm...... looks 'intact' in the photo. Did somebody do something clumsy  Slayer
maybe you should stick to ugly sticks eh reuben!

Hahahah come on guys I thought you were steelheaders! 9 foot rod...2 pieces....I had the 2 pieces rubber banded together, went to slip it into the back of my buddies trunk to go to next pool, damn trunk lid slipped out of my hand and SLICE! The damn lid sheared my rod halves in half again!
man, thats a bummer, I feel your pain
Send it off too Spiel. He,ll make it a 4 pc CUSTOM.

Shut it! Im gonna ship it next week for replacement along with another avid I have that im going to have upgraded to a Legend Tournament, life and death, ying and yang all is balanced in the universe I say!

OUCH !!!! that poor rod , you'll be in trouble now , new rod no MOJO ....  uh oh better ship it back i'll use it for a couple weeks again  or send it to SOLO i cant keep trout off the rod i bought from him
I've got another rod for you bud just oozing with mojo.  Archie if you decide you don't want the Avid I'll buy it from you. It'll make a perfect live bait rigging rod for walleye.
Vultures all of you!!! It's getting sent back to Croix for the 50$ no questions asked replacement along with another non broken avid I have for upgrading to a legend tournament bass
